alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 9:42PM EST until February 02 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River from Edwardsport to Hazleton. .Minor flooding will continue on the East Fork White at Seymour until Tuesday morning. Minor lowland flooding will continue at Edwardsport and develop over the next couple of days at Petersburg and Hazleton on the White River and last through the week. The crest on the White is near Elliston. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding begins in lowest bottomlands and a few local roads. High water affects a few low oil fields. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 16.5 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Tuesday afternoon by around 1245 PM EST /1145 AM CST/.
